column5: The farm is 20 minutes from Roundtop/ 15 minutes from Brenham's historical district and 20 minutes from The Antique Rose Emporium. Youâ€™ll love the farm because of the lovely light, the comfy beds, and its coziness. Romantic couples, families, solo adventurers, business travelers, ladies getaways, birding groups and yoga retreats will all be happy here.
